sentences.en: A quick movement across the aisle caught his eye.
sentences.cn: 有个人影在走道里一闪而过，引起了他的注意。

sentences.en: An aisle ran the length of the house.
sentences.cn: 过道的长度等于房子的长度.

sentences.en: he held me firmly by the elbow and led me to my aisle seat.
sentences.cn: 他紧紧抓住我的胳膊肘，把我领到靠过道的座位上。

sentences.en: He started down the centre aisle.
sentences.cn: 他从中间过道开始往前走。

sentences.en: He was in no hurry to walk down the aisle.
I think our seat is near the center aisle.
sentences.cn: 我想我们的座位靠近中间走廊。

sentences.en: I walked up and down the aisle to stretch my cramped muscles.
sentences.cn: 我在楼道里走来走去以舒展我痉挛的肌肉.

sentences.en: No, no, no. I like the aisle seat better.
sentences.cn: 不不不. 我喜欢坐在靠过道的地方.

sentences.en: She arose and tried to push out into the aisle -- anywhere.
sentences.cn: 她站起身来,想用力走到过道上 -- 什么地方都行.

sentences.en: The aisle was crammed with people.
The aisle was floored with ancient bricks.
sentences.cn: 过道由古旧的砖块铺就。

sentences.en: The best seats are in the aisle and as far forward as possible.
sentences.cn: 最好的座位在过道处，越靠前越好。

sentences.en: The girl ushered me along the aisle to my seat.
sentences.cn: 引座小姐带领我沿着通道到我的座位上去.

sentences.en: The organ played as the bride came down the aisle.
sentences.cn: 当新娘沿着通道走过来时,风琴演奏了起来.

sentences.en: When a bride walks down the aisle to a stirring tune, even the iciest of hearts melt.
sentences.cn: 当新娘伴着激动人心的乐曲走在教堂的走廊上时，即便最冰冷的心都会融化。

sentences.en: Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat (=  seat next to the aisle  ) ?
sentences.cn: 您想要靠窗的座位还是靠过道的座位？

phrases.tran_cn: [口语] 沿教堂走道而去(至圣坛举行婚礼)

trans.tran_cn: 走道，过道，行婚礼的仪式
trans.tran_en: a long passage between rows of seats in a church, plane, theatre etc, or between rows of shelves in a shop
